name: Mind Lock
description:
Enter a world inside your own mind. Watch your imagination come to life before you, as you come to face life struggles that may seem all too familiar.

Mind Lock is a 2D rogue-like experience that welcomes players to explore strange worlds and craft hundreds of custom spells never seen before. This game was created with the intention to expand your creative thinking, and to find your passion in crafting your way to success. All we want is for players to craft, explore, and have fun!

We also intend to add accessibility for the speed running community. We are huge fans of speed running assemblies, and hope to enable speed runners the means to have smooth streaming experience.
